Subjects: Christ, triumph of; sermons, verse in
_description: Verses celebrating the triumph of Christ — four cross-rhymed lines in a Latin sermon de ascensione domini

CULIi38.Transcription:
Þe ȝate is opunÞe kyng communÞe couenaund is
                    brokun& þe sesig is nomun
